/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the surroundings. The street is flanked by buildings and trees, their greenery contrasting with the urban architecture. Power lines crisscross above, adding a touch of modernity to the scene. The sky is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting shadows that add depth to the image. The colors are vibrant, with the green of the trees and grass standing out against the blue of the sky.
